options.title: -p, --parents
options.description: remove DIRECTORY and its ancestors; e.g., 'rmdir -p a/b/c' is similar to 'rmdir a/b/c a/b a'

options.title: -p, --parents
options.description: remove DIRECTORY and its ancestors; e.g., 'rmdir -p a/b/c' is similar to 'rmdir a/b/c a/b a'

options.title: -v, --verbose
options.description: output a diagnostic for every directory processed
